mapper.select: SELECT upload_channel.id AS id_device, config_information1.description AS type_protocol , config_information2.name AS time_log_interval FROM upload_channel INNER JOIN config_information AS config_information1 ON upload_channel.id_type_protocol = config_information1.id INNER JOIN config_information AS config_information2 ON upload_channel.id_type_logging_interval = config_information2.id WHERE upload_channel.id = %s AND upload_channel.status = 1;
SELECT device_list.id, device_list.name , device_list.rtu_bus_address FROM device_list WHERE status = 1

SELECT device_list.id FROM device_list JOIN `device_type` ON `device_type`.`id` = `device_list`.`id_device_type`
WHERE `device_type`.`name` = "PV System Inverter" AND `device_list`.`status` = 1

SELECT device_list.id, device_list.name, device_list.rtu_bus_address FROM device_list INNER JOIN upload_channel_device_map ON device_list.id = upload_channel_device_map.id_device WHERE device_list.status = 1 AND upload_channel_device_map.id_upload_channel = %s;

INSERT INTO sync_data (id, id_device, modbusdevice, ensuredir, source, filename, createtime, DATA, id_upload_channel) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE modbusdevice = %s , ensuredir = %s, source = %s, filename = %s, createtime = %s, DATA = %s, id_upload_channel = %s
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `device_point_list_map` WHERE id_device_list = %s
SELECT config_information.name AS time_log_interval FROM project_setup INNER JOIN config_information ON project_setup.id_logging_interval = config_information.id
UPDATE sync_data SET error= 1 WHERE id = %s AND id_upload_channel = %s AND id_device = %s;
SELECT config_information.value AS time_log_data_server FROM project_setup INNER JOIN config_information ON project_setup.id_time_wait_before_retry = config_information.id
UPDATE sync_data SET number_of_time_retry = %s WHERE id = %s AND id_upload_channel = %s AND id_device = %s;
SELECT config_information.value AS time_log_data_server FROM project_setup INNER JOIN config_information ON project_setup.id_scheduled_upload_time = config_information.id
UPDATE sync_data SET synced = 1, updatetime = %s WHERE id = %s AND id_upload_channel = %s AND id_device = %s;
SELECT * FROM sync_data WHERE id_upload_channel = %s AND synced = 0 AND updatetime IS NULL AND error IS NULL AND id_device = %s ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS remaining_files FROM `sync_data` WHERE synced = 0 AND error IS NULL AND id_upload_channel = %s;
SELECT * FROM sync_data WHERE id_upload_channel = %s AND synced = 0 AND updatetime IS NULL AND error IS NULL AND id_device = %s ORDER BY id_device LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sync_data WHERE id_upload_channel = %s AND synced = 0 AND updatetime IS NULL AND error IS NULL AND id_device = %s ORDER BY id_device LIMIT 100;
INSERT INTO sync_data (id, id_device, modbusdevice, ensuredir, source, filename, createtime, DATA, id_upload_channel) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
SELECT pl.id_pointkey AS template_name FROM device_list dl JOIN device_group dg ON dl.id_device_group = dg.id JOIN point_list pl ON dg.id_template = pl.id_template WHERE dl.id = %s;

SELECT `point_list`.`id_pointkey` , config_information.namekey FROM device_point_list_map JOIN device_list ON device_point_list_map.id_device_list = device_list.id JOIN point_list ON point_list.id = device_point_list_map.id_point_list JOIN `config_information` ON config_information.id = `point_list`.`id_config_information` WHERE device_list.id = %s AND device_point_list_map.status = 1 AND `device_list`.`id_template` = `point_list`.`id_template`
SELECT `project_setup`.`serial_number` FROM `project_setup`
UPDATE device_mppt SET voltage = %s, current = %s WHERE id_device_list = %s AND namekey = %s;
